siteInfoSection.subTitleInfo: We will help you improve and improve your language level. You can choose any course according to your wishes and needs. You can study with us both in a group and individually, with a teacher or independently (for this you can choose a course for self-study). You choose a schedule that is convenient for you and together with you we do everything necessary so that you notice the results already after the first class

teacherSofiia.introduction: Sofiia Shtohryn is a young but experienced English teacher with 12 years of experience. She combines modern technologies and an individual approach, helping students to achieve high results in language learning in the shortest period of time.

teacherAnastasiia.introduction: Anastasiia Plashchynska is a young teacher of the Polish language with three years of experience. She uses interactive technologies and a creative approach to make lessons interesting and effective for her students.

teacherDiana.introduction: Diana Koshman is a young German teacher with more than three years of experience. She uses communicative teaching methods and organizes practical classes that help students to gain confidence in speaking German.

answerOne.question: How is the training?
answerOne.response: Our online English lessons take place on the JustSchool interactive platform. Here you can communicate with the teacher in real time and perform interesting interactive tasks.

answerTwo.question: What does the course include?
answerTwo.response: Our course includes video lessons, practical tasks, testing and the opportunity to receive feedback from teachers.

answerThree.question: What approaches are used in training?
answerThree.response: We use a variety of methods and approaches, such as the communicative method, game techniques and an individual approach to each student.

answerFour.question: What are the advantages of distance learning?
answerFour.response: Remote learning gives you the opportunity to study conveniently from anywhere and at your own pace, with efficient use of time.

reviewLara.respond: Good afternoon, I definitely recommend the online school „STUDYOUA“. Qualified specialists, an excellent platform, I really like the methodology and availability of teaching. The child has been studying for the third year, good results, and most importantly, prepares with interest and is looking forward to the next lesson with teacher Anna.
reviewLara.name: Lara

reviewJoseph.respond: Good day! My son has been in school for almost a year. We are very satisfied with the quality of training and service in general. Everything is on time, of high quality and always as convenient for us. We thank the school for our knowledge.
